```js
class TemporarySnackbarExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { show: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ show: true })}>Show</Button>
        <TemporarySnackbar
          show={this.state.show}
          message="Hello, world!"
          actionText="Action"
          onClose={() => this.setState({ show: false })}
          onAction={() => this.setState({ show: false })}
        />
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<TemporarySnackbarExample />;
```
